election_record.label: Pennsylvania 1790 Governor

sub_unit.name: Berks
sub_unit.note: The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) lists 2360 votes for Thomas Mifflin.

sub_unit.name: Bucks
sub_unit.note: The Freeman's Journal: or, the North-American Intelligencer (Philadelphia, PA), The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA), and The Pennsylvania Packet, and Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) list Thomas Mifflin with 2286 votes.

sub_unit.name: Chester
sub_unit.note: The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) lists 850 votes for Thomas Mifflin and 80 votes for Arthur Saint Clair.

sub_unit.name: Cumberland
sub_unit.note: The Carlisle Gazette, and the Western Repository of Knowledge (Carlisle, PA) lists 865 votes for Thomas Mifflin and 64 votes for Arthur Saint Clair.

sub_unit.name: Delaware
sub_unit.note: Several newspapers reported 19 votes for Arthur Saint Clair, including The Federal Gazette and Philadelphia Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA), The Pennsylvania Packet, and Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA), and The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA).

sub_unit.name: Fayette
sub_unit.note: The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) lists 324 votes for Arthur Saint Clair.
Journal of the Pennsylvania State Senate for 1790 lists 399 votes for Arthur Saint Clair.

sub_unit.name: Huntingdon
sub_unit.note: The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) lists 284 votes for Thomas Mifflin.

sub_unit.name: Lancaster
sub_unit.note: The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) lists 39 votes for Arthur Saint Clair.

sub_unit.name: Luzerne
sub_unit.note: The votes from Luzerne County were missing in the Official Returns.

sub_unit.name: Montgomery
sub_unit.note: The General Advertiser lists 2197 votes for Thomas Mifflin.

sub_unit.name: Northampton
sub_unit.note: The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) lists 90 votes for Arthur Saint Clair.

sub_unit.name: Northumberland
sub_unit.note: The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) lists 965 votes for Thomas Mifflin.
The Annals of Buffalo Valley lists 865 votes for Thomas Mifflin.

sub_unit.name: Philadelphia
sub_unit.note: The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) lists 1434 votes for Thomas Mifflin.
Journal of the Pennsylvania State Senate for 1790 lists 1421 votes for Thomas Mifflin.

sub_unit.name: Washington
sub_unit.note: The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) and the Albert Gallatin Papers list 1740 votes for Thomas Mifflin and 543 votes for Arthur Saint Clair.

sub_unit.name: York
sub_unit.note: The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) lists 50 votes for Arthur Saint Clair.
